pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:0.5.eng: 64. The training rule on lying down

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six gave teachings to people who were lying down. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.3.1.pli: “Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching to anyone lying down who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching to anyone lying down who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca antamaso chamāyampi nipannassa sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching to someone who is lying down and who is not sick, even if they are just lying on the ground, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:1.9.eng: The fourth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:0.5.eng: 65. The training rule on clasping the knees

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six gave teachings to people who were seated clasping their knees. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.3.1.pli: “Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching to anyone who is seated clasping their knees and who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.4.pli: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching to anyone who is seated clasping their knees and who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching to someone who is clasping their knees with their hands or with a cloth and who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.9.eng: The fifth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū veṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six gave teachings to people with headdresses. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.3.1.pli: “Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching to anyone with a headdress who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.5.eng: if the ends of the hair are not showing it is a headdress.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.6.eng: One should not give a teaching to anyone with a headdress who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.7.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.7.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching to someone with a headdress who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.13.eng: if he teaches the person after having them uncover the ends of their hair;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.16.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.17.eng: The sixth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:0.5.eng: 67. The training rule on covered heads

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū oguṇṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six gave teachings to people with covered heads. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.3.1.pli: “Na oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching to anyone with a covered head who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.5.eng: the upper robe covering the head is what is meant.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.6.eng: One should not give a teaching to anyone with a covered head who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.7.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.7.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching to someone with a covered head who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.13.eng: if he teaches the person after having them uncover their head;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.16.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk67:1.17.eng: The seventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:0.5.eng: 68. The training rule on the ground

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were sitting on the ground giving teachings to people sitting on seats. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.3.1.pli: “Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching while sitting on the ground to anyone sitting on a seat who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.4.pli: Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching while sitting on the ground to anyone sitting on a seat who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching while sitting on the ground to someone sitting on a seat who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk68:1.9.eng: The eighth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:0.5.eng: 69. The training rule on low seats

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were sitting on low seats while giving teachings to people sitting on high seats.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.3.pli: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.3.eng: The monks of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.4.eng: “How can the monks from the group of six sit on low seats while giving teachings to people sitting on high seats?” …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.5.pli: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.5.eng: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.8.pli: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.8.eng: “Foolish men, how can you do this?

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.11.eng: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.12.1.pli: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, bārāṇasiyaṃ aññatarassa chapakassa pajāpati gabbhinī ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.12.1.eng: “Once upon a time in Bārāṇasī, monks, there was a low-caste man whose wife became pregnant.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.13.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sā chapakī taṃ chapakaṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.16.eng: ‘But there are no mangoes. It’s the wrong season.’

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.17.eng: ‘If I don’t get any, I’ll die.’

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.18.pli: Tena kho pana samayena rañño ambo dhuvaphalo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.18.eng: At that time the king had a mango tree that was always bearing fruit.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.19.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so chapako yena so ambo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ ambaṃ abhiruhitvā nilīno acchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.19.eng: Then that low-caste man went to that mango tree, climbed it, and hid himself.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.20.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, rājā purohitena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ yena so ambo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ucce āsane nisīditvā mantaṃ pariyāpuṇāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.20.eng: Just then the king and his brahmin counselor went to that same mango tree. There the king sat on a high seat while learning the Vedas.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.21.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa chapakassa etadahosi—

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.22.pli: ‘yāva adhammiko ayaṃ rājā, yatra hi nāma ucce āsane nisīditvā mantaṃ pariyāpuṇissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.22.eng: ‘How wrong-headed this king is, sitting on a high seat while learning the Vedas.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.23.pli: Ayañca brāhmaṇo adhammiko, yatra hi nāma nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa mantaṃ vācessati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.23.eng: And the brahmin is wrong-headed too, sitting on a low seat while teaching the Vedas to one sitting on a high seat.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.24.pli: Ahañcamhi adhammiko, yohaṃ itthiyā kāraṇā rañño ambaṃ avaharāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.24.eng: And I’m wrong-headed too, stealing mangoes from the king because of a woman.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.25.comm: Sp-ṭ 2.647: Yaṁ amhehi tīhi janehi kataṁ, sabbamidaṁ kiccaṁ lāmakaṁ nimmariyādaṁ adhammikaṁ, “What the three of us have done is all low, outside of acceptable bounds, and unrighteous.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.26.eng: And he fell out of the tree right there.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.27.1.comm: The attribution of speakers is according to Sp 2.647.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.29.eng: Not he who teaches the Vedas,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.32.eng: With a curry of pure meat:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.33.eng: Therefore I’m not practicing the Teaching,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.34.eng: The Teaching praised by the Noble Ones.’

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.35.0.eng: The low-caste man replies in turn:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.35.1.eng: ‘A curse it is the obtaining of wealth,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.36.eng: And so is becoming popular, brahmin;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.37.eng: These things come with a low rebirth,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.40.eng: Other beings will do the cooking;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.42.eng: Because you’ll break like a jar.’

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.43.pli: Tadāpi me, bhikkhave, amanāpā nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa mantaṃ vācetuṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana etarahi na amanāpā bhavissati nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.43.eng: Even at that time, monks, I was displeased by someone teaching the Vedas while sitting on a low seat to someone sitting on a high seat. How, then, could it not be displeasing now?

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.45.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.45.eng: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.46.1.pli: “Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.46.1.eng: ‘“I will not give a teaching while sitting on a low seat to anyone sitting on a high seat who is not sick,” this is how you should train.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.47.pli: Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.47.eng: One should not give a teaching while sitting on a low seat to anyone sitting on a high seat who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.48.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.48.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching while sitting on a low seat to someone sitting on a high seat who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.51.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.52.eng: The ninth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:0.5.eng: 7. The training rule on lowered eyes

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were looking here and there while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will lower my eyes while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.4.eng: One should lower one’s eyes while walking in an inhabited area, looking a plow’s length ahead.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, looks here and there while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.13.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:1.14.eng: The seventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ṭhitā nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were standing while giving teachings to people who were sitting. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.3.1.pli: “Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching while standing to anyone sitting who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.4.pli: Na ṭhitena nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching while standing to anyone sitting who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching while standing to someone sitting who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:1.9.eng: The tenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:0.5.eng: 71. The training rule on walking behind

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were giving teachings to people walking in front of them. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.3.1.pli: “Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching to anyone walking in front of me who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.4.pli: Na pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching to anyone walking in front of oneself who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching to someone walking in front of him who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.9.eng: The eleventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:0.5.eng: 72. The training rule on walking next to the path

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were walking next to the path while giving teachings to people walking on the path. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.3.1.pli: “Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not give a teaching while walking next to the path to anyone walking on the path who is not sick,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.4.pli: Na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.4.eng: One should not give a teaching while walking next to the path to anyone walking on the path who is not sick.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, gives a teaching while walking next to the path to someone walking on the path who is not sick, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.9.eng: The twelfth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:0.5.eng: 73. The training rule on defecating while standing

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi karonti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were defecating and urinating while standing. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.3.1.pli: “Na ṭhito agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.3.1.eng: “‘When not sick, I will not defecate or urinate while standing,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.4.pli: Na ṭhitena agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.4.eng: If one is not sick, one should not defecate or urinate while standing.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.5.eng: If, out of disrespect, a monk who is not sick defecates or urinates while standing, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk73:1.9.eng: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
